rules_text:
Improvise [i](Your artifacts can help cast this spell. Each artifact you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1}.)[/i]
Exile target spell. Put two time counters on it and if doesn't have suspend, it gains suspend.
rules_text2:
Aftermath [i](Cast this spell only from your graveyard. Then exile it.)[/i]
Exile the top two cards of your library face-down. You may look at them at anytime.
